+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Grade | Movement                                                                                                    |
+=======+=============================================================================================================+
| 0     | Paralysis                                                                                                   |
+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1     | Palpable or visible contraction                                                                             |
|       |                                                                                                             |
+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 2     | Movement with gravity eliminated                                                                            |
+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 3     | Antigravity movement                                                                                        |
+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 4     | Movement against moderate resistance                                                                        |
|       | Additional (subjective) nuance can be documented by using 4+ or 4- for varying levels of "some" resistance. |
+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 5     | Movement against full resistance                                                                            |
+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 5*    | Expected movement against full resistance if inhibiting factors (pain, myopathy) were not contributing      |
+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NT    | Not testable                                                                                                |
|       | e.g. Due to immobilisation, pain, amputation, or contractures.                                              |
+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

: Grading of Motor Function
